Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension® RxL Max clinical chemistry analyzer (with Linux Operating System)
Dimension® clinical chemistry systems with Linux Operating System (revision 10.0 software)
Dimension® Thyroid Stimulating Hormone Flex Reagent Cartridge
Dimension® Aspartate Aminotransferase Flex Reagent Cartridge
Regulation Name(s): Discrete photometric chemistry analyzer for clinical use
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Siemens Dimension® clinical chemistry systems with Linux OS for automated measurement of chemistry analytes in human body fluids
Indications for Use Summary: Automated measurement of sodium, potassium, chloride, glucose, TSH, and AST in human body fluids for the diagnosis and monitoring of electrolyte imbalances, metabolic disorders, diabetes, thyroid and pituitary disorders, and liver and heart diseases.
